```{r, pakkar}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(plotly)
```

```{r, data og annað}
data_ls <- read_rds("full_data.rds")

# Litir
vr_litir <- c("#00305c", "#028fbc", "#eec215", "#d64550", "#4fb94f", "#7d5ba6", "#e07b39", "#3a8e8e")
valuebox_litir <- c("#2E7D6E", "#E57373", "#F9A825")

# Date
date_back_year     <- floor_date(today(), "year") - months(12)
date_from_max_back <- year(today()) - 4
date_from_x <- "2020-01-01"
# Texti

```

```{r, hjalparfoll}
# VR plot layout
vr_layout <- function(plot, tooltip = c("x", "y", "colour", "text")) {
  plotly::ggplotly(plot, tooltip = tooltip) |>
    plotly::layout(
      legend = list(
        title = list(text = ""),
        orientation = "h",
        y = -0.2,
        x = 0.5,
        xanchor = "center"
      )
    )
}
```


# Þjóðhagsreikningar

## Row

```{r, gdp_components}
gdp_comp_use <- c("Einkaneysla", "Samneysla", "Fjárfesting alls", "Innflutningur", "Útflutningur", "Verg Landsframleiðsla")

p1 <- data_ls$gdp_comp |> 
  filter(skipting %in% gdp_comp_use) |> 
  arrange(date, skipting) |> 
  group_by(skipting) |> 
  mutate(
    delta = value / lag(value, 4) - 1,
    skipting = factor(skipting, levels = gdp_comp_use),
    tooltip_text = glue::glue(
    "{skipting}\n",
    "Dags: {format(date, '%Y-%m')}\n",
    "Breyting: {scales::percent(delta, accuracy = 0.1)}"
    )
    ) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  filter(year(date) >= date_from_max_back) |> 
  ggplot(aes(date, delta, text = tooltip_text)) + 
  geom_col(fill = vr_litir[1]) + 
  facet_wrap(~ skipting) +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = percent) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL
    #subtitle = "Innflutningur kemur til frádráttar í landsframleiðslu"
  )

vr_layout(p1, tooltip = "text") |> 
  layout(
    title = list(
      text = "Innflutningur kemur til frádráttar í landsframleiðslu",
      font = list(size = 14),
      x = 0,
      xanchor = "left"
    )
  )
```

  filter(date >= date_from_x) |> 
  rename("Atvinnuleysi" = "atvinnuleysi") |>

  drop_na() |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = -date) |>

  )

vr_layout(p6)

# Laun

## Row

```{r, launavisitala_hagstofu}
launavisitala_tbl <- data_ls$launavisitala |>
  filter(date >= date_from_x) |> 
  mutate(date = floor_date(date, "quarter")) |> 
  group_by(date) |> 
  summarise(launavisitala = mean(launavisitala)) |> 
  mutate(Launavísitala = launavisitala / lag(launavisitala, 4) - 1) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  select(-launavisitala)

radstofunartekjur_tbl <- data_ls$radstofunartekjur |>
  mutate("Ráðstöfunartekjur" = value / lag(value, 4) - 1) |>
  drop_na() |> 
  select(-value)

p10 <- radstofunartekjur_tbl |> 
  left_join(launavisitala_tbl) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  filter(date >= "2020-01-01") |>
  pivot_longer(cols = -date) |> 
  ggplot(aes(date, value, fill = name)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = vr_litir) + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = percent) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL,
    title = "Launavísitala Hagstofu og ráðstöfunartekjur, breyting frá samatíma árið á undan"
  )

vr_layout(p10)

```

# Húsnæðisverð

## Row

```{r, husnaedisver}
p14 <- data_ls$kaupverd |> 
  mutate(
    name = 
      case_when(
        name == "visitala" ~ "Vísitala kaupverðs",
        name == "visitala_hofudborgarsvaedi" ~ "Höfuðborgarsvæðið",
        name == "visitala_landsbyggd" ~ "Landsbyggðin",
        name == "visitala_serbyli_hofudborgarsvaedi" ~ "Sérbýli á höfuðborgarsvæðinu",
        name == "visitala_fjolbyli_hofudborgarsvaedi" ~ "Fjölbýli á höfuðborgarsvæðinu",
        name == "visitala_serbyli_landsbyggd" ~ "Sérbýli landsbyggðin",
        TRUE ~ "Fjölbýli landsbyggðin"
      )
  ) |> 
  group_by(name) |> 
  mutate(value = value / value[1] * 100) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  ggplot(aes(date, value, col = name)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL,
    title = "Vísitala fasteignaverðs"
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(values = vr_litir)

vr_layout(p14)
```
